oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pescarol, Moshe ben Avraham
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bible. O.T.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Illuminated scroll, earliest known example of an Italian illustrated Magillah. This section shows three panels, the first shows shows four men standing together. Three men are dressed in black and the fourth in a long blue coat. The second shows a Queen sat at table accompanied by two men in turbans. The third panel shows three standing men, two soldiers in grey stood by a King in the middle wearing a red cape.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Detail of Esther scroll
